description.desc: Developed RESTful web services for production environments using Java/J2EE, Spring and Hibernate extensively.
Involved in agile SDLC development methodology by engineering solutions through continuous integration and development model.
Contributed to quality assurance by writing test cases for cross platform application engineering and testing in a dynamic and test-driven development (TDD) environment.
Actively involved in gathering technical requirements and designing them using Object Oriented Programming (OOP) approach.
Participated in software engineering of high quality solutions by adhering to proper design patterns and good programming skills.
Appreciated for passionate, strategic thinking and positive impact on team management through delivery of high performance and low latency data analytics tool.

responsibilities.name: Metrics
responsibilities.description: Architected a data analysis and visualization tool as an effective team management solution and acting as a liaison for gathering the requirements. Participated as Lead and Primary Java developer for the project.

responsibilities.name: Index Management
responsibilities.description: Contributed as a Java developer and tester using Spring and Hibernate to create an online index tool (REST webservice) for the legal division of Thomson Reuters

achievements.desc: Awarded for the involvement in technical innovation by addressing a tech talk on AMQP protocol.

description.desc: Developed mobile applications using Android SDK.
Actively involved in creation of an application called Track the Trails.
Contributed to modules of the applicaiton that used GPS and Camera sensors for geo-tagging the images.
Developed mobile applications using Android SDK.
